title: Corporate Account Specialist
duties: Performed continuous research to ensure that our educational products complied with evolving continuing education requirements across each U.S. state
Developed a tool to generate state continuing education filing forms, reducing the time it took to prepare filing forms for our courses from over an hour to just a few minutes
Worked with corporate customers to manage continuing education requirements for their employees
Assisted customers with general inquiries over phone, email, and online chat
